actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to terminate the suspension of assistance under FHA's section 235 program of homeownership for lower income families and to carry out such program to the full extent of the funds and contract authority made available to him by law.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to terminate the suspension of assistance authorized by the National Housing Act's program of homeownership for lower income families, and to carry out such program to the full extent of the funds and contract authority made available to him by law.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to terminate the suspension of assistance under FHA's section 235 program of homeownership for lower income families and to carry out such program to the full extent of the funds and contract authority made available to him by law.
